Quickstrike:





"Me neither," Quickstrike replied to Dark Mouse. He thought, too, 
something was up. Why did Black Arachnia want them to go to the 
Predacon cave? The last time he knew, she was against Megatron. 

He shook his head and started off to the coordinates Black Arachnia 
gave him. "Why in tarnation would sugar-bot want us t' meet back up 
wit' Megatron?" He had his head low to the ground, with his tail 
tightly curled over his back.
